actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide restrictions upon the disclosure of an individual's social security account number, to require certain information be provided to any individual who is requested to disclose or furnish his social security account number, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Places restrictions upon the disclosure of an individual's social security account number. Requires specified information to be provided to any individual who is requested to disclose or furnish his social security account number.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide restrictions upon the disclosure of an individual's social security account number, to require certain information be provided to any individual who is requested to disclose or furnish his social security account number, and for other purposes.
